text: I'd call a sushi chef to the house and have them make sushi, and then we'd all eat it.

I'd cry to the heavens about not being able to use that 100,000 yen to buy time.
Captain Tabata

I'd buy camping equipment and attempt a solo camping trip.
Comics editor Fujiwara

I'd buy an Aeron office chair.
Editor Iwasaki

Right now, my one-year-old daughter is squealing happily and toddling around the house.
I know I'm being a total "doting parent" here, but...
she's so cute it's mind-boggling!!!
When we go outside though, her face goes blank and she gets unsociable.
She's a lion at home, and a mouse outside!!
So is my wife!! So is our beloved dog!!!
All the women in my house are like that!!
It's adorable!! Yaaaaaaaaaaaaaay!!!
